str2: One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a compound of eu and hodos; to help on the road, i.e. succeed in reaching; figuratively, to succeed in business affairs.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To store up, treasure up, save, lay up. From thesauros; to amass or reserve.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
